title: High plat MID LFT - Ranked plat +
body:
Hi, 

Looking to find a serious team that is interested in trying to take the next level together and play serious. 

**Bit about myself**;
- My name is Matt
- I am 22
- I aspire to play mid lane, I like to fill adc
- I am highly motivated.
- I have played at the highest level of competitive FPS on console through cybergamer.
- I was previously in a ranked 5's team that went belly up that was in diamond 4.




**What I'm interested in, in a team**; 
- Wanting to scrim most weekday nights
- Wanting to always better themselves with analysis
- Wanting to participate in touraments/riot hosted events. 


**My goals**; 
- To always better myself every day through soloQ and team practice
- To one day be playing in challenger both in ranked solo and 5v5 ranked. 
- To achieve atleast diamond 3 in solo Q in this 6 month period of 2016. 

If you are interested in more i am on all days and my client is never closed. 
My IGN is _**Gankedbysleep**_
Just friend request me, and we can have a chat! 

Thanks for reading.
